document_data.name: Deep Delvers
document_data.mainbody: The '''Deep Delvers''' were young heirs of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian nobility]] adventuring in [[Undermountain]].
document_data.Activities: Being bored young men, the Delvers would seek excitement by exploring Undermountain. They were looking for danger and dares, and usually brought back trophies and other tokens proving their achievements. They would sometimes play pranks on other [[adventurer]]s, which would gain them fame among their companions.
document_data.Base of Operations: When they were not attempting daring deeds, the Delvers could be found in the [[Yawning Portal]] drinking and telling the tales of their adventures.
document_data.Possessions: When entering Undermountain, the Delvers would always bring with them the 'up fee', which was paid to be hauled back up in the Yawning Portal at the end of their journey.
document_data.Members:
